definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: We are trying to help out by delivering flour to bakeries.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在設法給麪包店送去麪粉，幫助它們度過難關。

sentences.english: A man's worst difficulties begin when he is able to do as he likes. (T. H. Huxley)
sentences.chinese: 一個人最大的難關是從他可以隨心所欲開始的。

sentences.english: Company high level is pacifying everybody's mood hard, the hope can cross difficulty in all.
sentences.chinese: 公司高層正在努力安撫大家的情緒，希望能共渡難關。

sentences.english: Judge Orie pointed out that getting evidence in this case was an uphill battle for prosecutors.
sentences.chinese: 奧列法官指出，這個案件的取證是檢方的一個難關。

sentences.english: They say, 'we can get through this one step at a time.'
sentences.chinese: 而會說這一次我們一定能闖過難關的。

sentences.english: We successfully broke-through the difficulty of artificial propagation of Aurelia.
sentences.chinese: 我們成功突破了海月水母的人工繁殖難關。

sentences.english: In this way they finally tided over the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，他們終於度過了許多難關。

sentences.english: I believe he is capable of mudding through this difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 我相信他總能混過這個難關。

sentences.english: He mustered up enough courage to attack the difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 他鼓起足夠的勇氣去攻克難關。

sentences.english: Finally, in the motherland and the people work together in harmony through the joint efforts of the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 最後，在祖國人民上下一心，共同努力下度過了難關。

sentences.english: Enthusiasm and desire can break through all the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 熱情和慾望可以突破一切難關。

sentences.english: And this time developers cannot count on credit to tide them over.
sentences.chinese: 而這一次開發商無法指望用信貸來渡過難關。

sentences.english: Father’s wise words had guided me once again.
sentences.chinese: 父親很有見地的那番話再次指引我度過了難關。

sentences.english: Red Cross appeals to the public for generous donations to help the victims in need.
sentences.chinese: 紅十字會懇請市民慷慨捐輸，以助他們渡過難關。

sentences.english: I am sure the guys and Argentine football will pull through.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定小夥子們和阿根廷足球可以渡過難關。

sentences.english: Tweet. Keep the pressure on Washington, and we can get past this.
sentences.chinese: 保持對華盛頓的壓力，我們一定能夠度過這一難關。

definition: to test/to put to the test/trial/ordeal
checkpoint (for taxation, security etc)/barrier/hurdle/red tape/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
